body_html: @joseortiz3 I have the same problem with you. I refer https://medium.com/@amsokol.com/update-1-how-to-build-and-install-tensorflow-gpu-cpu-for-windows-from-source-code-using-bazel-and-c2e86fec9ef2, do the same progress work for me. I think the key is "There is a BUG in eigen third-party library" as mentioned in the article. My environment: Windows 10, RTX 2080, cuda 10.0, cudnn 7.3, VS2017
